name: AddressValidity
description: The purpose of this type is to assert that the string represents a valid address on an external chain.
verification:
The address is checked against all validity criteria of the chain with `sourceId`.
 Validity criteria for each supported chain:
 - [BTC](attestation-objects/verification-rules/00005/BTC.md)
 - [DOGE](attestation-objects/verification-rules/00005/DOGE.md)
 - [XRP](attestation-objects/verification-rules/00005/XRP.md)
 - [Ethereum](attestation-objects/verification-rules/00005/ETH.md)

proof.name: Proof

params.name: merkleProof
params.comment: Merkle proof corresponding to the attestation response.

request.name: Request

params.name: attestationType
params.comment: Attestation type id as defined for each attestation type on [this repo](https://gitlab.com/flarenetwork/state-connector-protocol/)

params.name: messageIntegrityCode
params.comment: `MessageIntegrityCode` that is derived from the expected response as defined [here](/attestation-objects/MIC.md#message-integrity-code).

params.name: requestBody
params.comment: Data defining the request. Type (struct) and interpretation is determined by the `attestationType`.

response.name: Response

params.name: votingRound
params.comment: The id of the state connector round in which the request was considered. This is a security measure to prevent collision of attestation hashes.

params.name: lowestUsedTimestamp
params.comment: The lowest timestamp used to generate the response.

params.name: responseBody
params.comment: Data defining the response. The verification rules for the construction of the response body and the type are defined per specific `attestationType`.

requestBody.name: RequestBody
requestBody.description: Request body for AddressValidity attestation type
requestBody.fullComment:
@notice Request body for AddressValidity attestation type
 @param addressStr Address to be verified.

responseBody.name: ResponseBody
responseBody.description: Response body for AddressValidity attestation type

params.name: standardAddress
params.comment: Standard form of the validated address.

params.name: standardAddressHash
params.comment: Standard address hash of the validated address.
